name: Checkvist MiniPanel
description:
Checkvist.com style for creating small window panel. Font size set to 12pt, minimalized margins, removed toolbar and topbar.
Change list: ll, move task: mm. For another setting and toolbar showing disable for a moment this style.
additional_info:
v 1.0 - first implementation
v 1.1 - fixed dir css
v 1.2 - added auto size to small window
v 1.3 - minimalist ul padding
v 1.4 - min-width edited to 5em, fixed bug padding selected/non-selected, added dashed border for tasks
